gears.name: Dome Tent
gears.overview: A spacious dome tent that accommodates up to 4 people. It features durable construction, waterproof material, and easy setup.

gears.name: Sleeping Bag
gears.overview: A cozy and lightweight sleeping bag with a temperature rating of 15°F. It is designed for cold weather camping and provides excellent insulation.

gears.name: Camping Stove
gears.overview: A portable camping stove with two burners and a wind-resistant design. It offers adjustable heat control and is compatible with various fuel types.

gears.name: Camping Chair
gears.overview: A foldable camping chair with a sturdy steel frame and comfortable padding. It comes with a cup holder and side pockets for convenience.

gears.name: Camping Lantern
gears.overview: A compact LED camping lantern with adjustable brightness levels. It is lightweight, water-resistant, and provides long-lasting illumination.

gears.name: Camping Cookware Set
gears.overview: A comprehensive cookware set for outdoor cooking. It includes pots, pans, utensils, and a compact stove. Perfect for preparing meals while camping.

gears.name: Camping Hammock
gears.overview: A lightweight and portable camping hammock for relaxing in the great outdoors. It is made of durable nylon and comes with suspension straps.

gears.name: Camping Cooler
gears.overview: An insulated camping cooler with a large capacity. It keeps food and drinks cold for extended periods, making it ideal for outdoor adventures.

gears.name: Camping Mattress
gears.overview: An inflatable camping mattress that offers comfort and support while sleeping outdoors. It is lightweight, compact, and comes with a carrying bag.

gears.name: Camping Grill
gears.overview: A portable camping grill for cooking delicious meals outdoors. It features a compact design, adjustable heat levels, and easy cleanup.

featured.name: Camping Stove
featured.overview: A portable camping stove with two burners and a wind-resistant design. It offers adjustable heat control and is compatible with various fuel types.

featured.name: Camping Chair
featured.overview: A foldable camping chair with a sturdy steel frame and comfortable padding. It comes with a cup holder and side pockets for convenience.
